titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the further proroguing the Parliament
Proclamations. 1666-04-06.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end: Given at our court at Whitehall, the 6th day of April, 1666. in the 18th year of our reign. God save the King.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
